name: Ebizaxe's Dungeon Escape
description:
Our protagonist must go through the different floors of the map, to eliminate the enemies and find the four jewels to win the game.

He has two attacks: a strong one, which consumes mana, and a weaker one. 

You have to open chests, break boxes and vases to find the different objects, potions and pieces of armor, which will give you the necessary skills to finish with the most powerful enemies.

Resources by https://pita.itch.io/ and others
